text:
Batik's DOM implementation doesn't seem to support replacing the top level <svg>
node in a document. I've tried two methods:
(a) using replaceChild()
(b) using removeChild(), then appendChild()

When I try to do this, the image just disappears (goes blank).

I'll attach a test Java program that demonstrates the problem.
creator: archie@dellroad.org
cam@apache.org
text:
Hi Archie.

Whether removal/replacement of the document element is supported is
implementation dependent.  DOM 3 Core says that if it is not supported, a
NOT_SUPPORTED_ERR DOMException should be thrown.  So I think Batik should either
throw the exception or ensure that it works.

creator: cam@apache.org
text:
Replacing the document element now works.  Various things don't work if the 
document has no document element, but I think that's acceptable.
